plot: In a thieves' den in a low quarter of Paris, Jean Bambard, a desperado, and Pigord, one of his gang, are apparently quarreling. They take frequent pulls from a brandy bottle on the table ...
title: The Flower Girl of Paris
plot_es: In a thieves' den in a low quarter of Paris, Jean Bambard, a desperado, and Pigord, one of his gang, are apparently quarreling. They take frequent pulls from a brandy bottle on the table ...
